amendment.description: Amendment sought to make changes to the findings section, clarifying that Congress holds responsibility for passing budgets and appropriating funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-8 to make changes to the findings section, clarifying that Congress holds responsibility for passing budgets and appropriating funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 228 (Roll no. 35).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Takano.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 228 (Roll no. 35).
